# Autogenerated by auto2cmake on 2018-03-07 11:49:59
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.8)

project( matio
         VERSION 1.5.11
         LANGUAGES C CXX #Fortran
)

find_package(Git)
if(Git_FOUND)
  message(STATUS "Git found: ${GIT_EXECUTABLE}")
  else()
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Git NOT found")
endif()

include(ExternalProject)
ExternalProject_Add(matio-download
  GIT_REPOSITORY    git@github.com:tbeu/matio.git
  # DOWNLOAD_COMMAND git clone git@github.com:tbeu/matio.git /tmp/foo/xx
  GIT_TAG           v1.5.11
  # SOURCE_DIR      /tmp/foo/yy
  CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
  BUILD_COMMAND ""
  INSTALL_COMMAND ""
  LOG_DOWNLOAD ON
)

# Installation options
include(GNUInstallDirs)

include(cmake/options.cmake)
include(cmake/thirdParties.cmake)
include(cmake/compilerOptions.cmake)

include(cmake/xxxxx.cmake)

include(cmake/src.cmake)
# include(cmake/getopt.cmake)
# include(cmake/tools.cmake)
# include(cmake/test.cmake)
add_dependencies(matio matio-download)

include(cmake/packaging.cmake)
